de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.externalFileManagement

Class OptionsSaveFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.externalFileManagement.OptionsSaveFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OptionsSaveFile
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The OptionsSaveFile class provides access to the Options file. It can read write data from and to the options file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.content.Context m_applicationContext
      The application context to get the files dir path.

      The stream which reads the m_saveFile

      The stream which writes the m_saveFile
      private String m_loginName
      The saved name for login.
      private File m_saveFile
      The file object of the save file
      private boolean m_showSavingDialog
      Saves if the saving dialog for login name should be shown or not.
      private String m_webServerURL
      The url to the web server.

        private String m_webServerURL
        The url to the web server. This is one of the statements read from the save file.

      • OptionsSaveFile

        public OptionsSaveFile(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Creates a new OptionsSaveFile instance. This instance is used to read and write data to the options file.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeObjects

        public void initializeObjects(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Initializes the necesarry objects for reading and saving data. Call this method after you pass this object via Intend to another activity.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - The application Context of the app.

      • webServerURL

        public String webServerURL()
        Gets the saved web server url from options file.
        Returns:
        The saved web server url.

      • loginName

        public String loginName()
        Gets the saved login name from options file.
        Returns:
        The login name which was saved.

      • isShowSavingDialog

        public boolean isShowSavingDialog()
        Gets the value for showing the saving dialog for the user name.
        Returns:
        True if the saving dialog should be shown.

      • setWebServerURL

        public void setWebServerURL(String webServerURL)
        Sets the web server url. This value will be saved in the save file for the options.
        Parameters:
        webServerURL - The url of the web server to connect to.

      • setLoginName

        public void setLoginName(String loginName)
        Sets the login name. This value will be saved in the save file for the options.
        Parameters:
        loginName - The login name to be saved.

      • setShowSavingDialog

        public void setShowSavingDialog(boolean showSavingDialog)
        Sets the value if the saving dialog for username should be shown. This value will be saved in the save file for the options.
        Parameters:
        showSavingDialog - true if the saving dialog shoul be shown.

      • readOptionFile

        private void readOptionFile()
        Reads the data from the m_saveFile.

      • saveOptionFile

        private void saveOptionFile()
        Saves the values currently set to the m_saveFile.
